name: Parangat Technologies
description:
In short span of time, Parangat has the satisfaction of being one of the leading names in enterprise-level apps development space with complete authority in integrating people, processes and products by providing customized, avant-garde and cost-effective solution for iPhone/iPads apps, android apps, website design and development.





We produce stellar and innovative iPhone/iPads apps that are designed and developed to enhance user experience, engage your customers, and build your mobile brand.
Simply put, we are service providers in
iOS (iPhone and iPad)
Android (smartphone and tablet)
Windows Phone
Cross-Platform App Development in Xamarin
Mac App Development
Cloud Computing
Why Us?
Client-Centric Approach
Completely process driven design and development
100% Safe, Secure & Authentic
Flexible engagement models
Supports all time zones
All time post development support.
